name: Wix
help: The WiX toolset lets developers create installers for Windows Installer, the Windows installation engine.

tasks.help: Build a wixlib, package, or bundle.

properties.name: Arch
properties.help: Architecture of the package or bundle. Valid values are: x86, x64, arm64. Default: x86. Equivalent MSBuild property: InstallerPlatform

properties.name: BindFiles
properties.help: Bind files into an output .wixlib. Ignored if not building a .wixlib.

properties.name: BindPath
properties.help: Bind path to search for content files.

properties.name: BindPathTarget
properties.help: Bind path to search for target package's content files. Only used when building a patch.

properties.name: BindPathUpdate
properties.help: Bind path to search for update package's content files. Only used when building a patch.

properties.name: BindVariable
properties.help: Sets a bind-time variable.

properties.name: CabCache
properties.help: Set a folder to cache cabinets across builds.

properties.name: Culture
properties.help: Adds a culture to filter localization files.

properties.name: Preprocessor
properties.help: Sets a preprocessor variable.

properties.name: DefaultCompressionLevel
properties.help: Specifies the compression level used when none is specified via MediaTemplate or Media.

properties.name: Extension
properties.help: Load a WiX extension for use during the build.

properties.name: IncludeFolder
properties.help: Folder to search for include files.

properties.name: IntermediateFolder
properties.help: Optional working folder. If not specified, a folder in %TMP% is created.

properties.name: Localization
properties.help: Localization file to use in the build. By default, .wxl files are recognized as localization.

properties.name: Library
properties.help: Library file to use in the build. By default, .wixlib files are recognized as libraries.

properties.name: Source
properties.help: Source file to use in the build. By default, .wxs files are recognized as source code.

properties.name: OutputDestination
properties.help: Destination path of output. Required when there are multiple source files; otherwise, defaults to the base name of the source file.

properties.name: OutputType
properties.help: Explicitly set the output type if it cannot be determined from the output.

properties.name: PDB
properties.help: Optional path to output .wixpdb. Default will write .wixpdb beside output path.

properties.name: PDBType
properties.help: Switch to disable creation of .wixpdb. Types: full or none.

properties.name: BuildFiles
properties.help: wxs source files

commonTaskProperties.name: Version
commonTaskProperties.help: Display WiX Toolset version in use.
